Params: {2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Psh, what d\'you mean, "can I handle it"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'No one but Karenina can handle this, is what you say!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina takes apart the bottom shell of the CPF with practiced ease and gets down to work with the equipment at hand.'}
{2: '???', 3: '...So what does Babylonia plan to do with us?'}
{2: '???', 3: "I dare say your cities won't have a place for us scavengers."}
{2: '???', 3: "It's fine, we're used to it. We do your dirty work, you give us your scraps. If there are no scraps, we wander and pick over the scraps that belong to the dead."}
{2: '???', 3: "You give us a fair price, we'll leave."}
{2: '???', 3: "Besides the Forsaken that sometimes passed by, no one's...ever treated us like this."}
{2: '???', 3: "I can't bring myself to trust you."}
{2: '...have the rest of your lives to learn to trust.', 3: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Task Force', 3: 'I heard you liberated Southwood Road?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'After all... the first time we liberated Southwood Road... we were as proud as you were.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'I still suggest you to get rid of this ticking time bomb as soon as you can. That is all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'It\'s not that they don\'t trust people... I prefer to say that they "have no concept of trust."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: "Be careful. Babylonia is not the only one who've made deals with them.", 4: '1'}
